events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover wedding expenses and initial planning costs.
The loan application was reviewed and officially categorised under Personal Loan based on keywords found in the request.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to handle the application and provide guidance throughout the loan process.
Initial review of the loan application and supporting documents began to evaluate eligibility and completeness.
Additional documentation including proof of income and identification was requested to verify the applicant's details.
Applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including bank statements and personal identification copies.
Credit report was obtained and analyzed, showing a good credit score and manageable existing debt obligations.
Risk assessment was conducted based on submitted documents and credit profile to evaluate loan repayment capacity.
A formal loan offer was prepared and presented to the applicant outlining terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule.
Applicant expressed satisfaction with the loan offer and requested clarification on some repayment terms before proceeding.
Loan officer escalated application to senior management for review of the custom repayment schedule request.
Loan application was officially approved after senior management accepted the modified repayment terms.
Approved funds were disbursed to the applicant's bank account to cover the wedding expenses as intended.
Follow-up communication was made with the applicant to ensure satisfaction and provide support for repayment.
The loan application case was officially closed after confirming all processes completed and applicant onboarded.
